programme.title: Christmas Carol (title to be confirmed)
programme.desc: Every Christmas Sydney celebrates with a concert of carols and seasonal music, with stars of stage and screen. Takes place in Sydney's largest park, "The Domain', with over 20,000 people attending.

programme.title: Aisle Be Home For Christmas
programme.desc: Two exes finally reconnect when a snowstorm leaves them stranded in a superstore (without mobile service or Wi-Fi) just before Christmas.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: LEGO Masters USA S3
programme.desc: This returning series brings imagination, design and creativity to life when teams of LEGO enthusiasts go head-to-head, with infinite possibilities and anunlimited supply of LEGO bricks. Teams of two will compete against each other in ambitious brick-building challenges to be crowned the country's most talented amateur LEGO builders.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze are two young forest monsters that snuck in one day out of the rain. They are a brother and sister, who liked the place so much they decided to stay. (Monsters sometimes do that and it's not even considered rude - but that's just monsters). Anyway, they're all living together in Bibi's magical house even though sometimes Hiccup and Sneeze don't really understand that being a monster and being a human are two very different things...

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C S2
programme.desc: Sham gets up to trick by pretending to be a scarecrow when Miss P, Ling and Didi come around to Club M.A.G.I.C! He gives the girls a good scare when he 'suddenly' comes to life. Miss P decides to send the Positive Agents to a farm to see what they can learn from it. THE BIG WORD introduces the world 'asparagus', a vegetable that is easily grown by farmers. From the big word, other smaller words are formed - gap, rap and pass.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S4
programme.desc: It's the Jungle Jamboree, and Izzy needs help getting 6 barrels of banana's to the party! Will the team be able to assist shipping the heavy barrels? Astrid accidentally creates a duplicate of herself on the Hologram Deck and can't reverse it. The holograms are causing chaos! Can the Number Squad help solve the problem of getting Astrid back to just one version of herself?

programme.desc: Cows & Crayons S2.

programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Oddbods: Santa Swap
programme.desc: The Oddbods are having fun on a Christmas trip, but after crashing into Santa's workshop, they're caught in a race against time!

programme.title: Wild Kratts S7
programme.desc: In each episode, Chris and Martin Kratt travel to a different corner of the world to meet amazing new animals. Join the Wild Kratts for a laugh-out-loud comedy adventure, as Martin and Chris activate their Creature Power Suits to rescue their animal friends!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13
programme.desc: A yellow sea sponge named SpongeBob SquarePants, who enjoys being a cook at Krusty Krab, lives in the Pacific Ocean. He embarks on various adventures with his friends at Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: Alfie's "World of Wow!"
programme.desc: How do grass and trees survive under the hot savanna sun? Alfie finds out as he travels to Africa to be dazzled by some stripey zebras and run with the spotted hyenas! Make your very own grasslands and see if you can freeze in time to the music like a dancing giraffe!

programme.title: Jade Armor S2
programme.desc: Join Lan Jun, the unlikely Chinese teen hero who inherits a magical suit of armor, and her Beasticon talking animal friends, as they continue to defend their city of Ban Tang, against the Crimson Lord and Black Tiger!

programme.title: Totally Spies S7
programme.desc: Season 7 takes the Spies on their biggest adventure yet, relocating from Beverly Hills to Singapore, experience a new culture and taking on a fresh crop of bizarre villains!

programme.title: Ultraman Omega
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Malay) There are many universes, they may be similar, but they have their own characteristics, as in the case of Omegaverse. A universe that's similar to the original Ultra universe, but has its own ultras. Omega is a Space Garrison rookie who was sent to Earth on a mission to protect it from monsters that appear mysteriously.

programme.title: P. King Duckling
programme.desc: P. King Duckling is an animated comedy series that follows the adventures of a friendly but slightly hapless duck P. King and his two best friends, Wombat and Chumpkins, as they find hilarious and creative ways to overcome challenges.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: When the farmer's away, all the animals play, and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

programme.desc: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

programme.title: Life In Colour With David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the vital role that colour plays in the daily life of various species. For us humans, it is a source of aesthetic beauty and expression, but for animals it is an essential tool used for survival and without it, there would be catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: Christmas in Paradise
programme.desc: Joanna's holiday is shattered when her sisters tell her that their dad has been dumped, isn't responding to any calls, and has disappeared to a Caribbean island. The sisters decide to go save their father and bring him home for Christmas.

programme.desc: Chef extraordinaire and everyone's dream husband, Gorden, has always had a huge following of fans and he has always loved the attention. Hence, when he gets his very own stalker, sending him flowers and gifts, he's thrilled. Sammi is tasked by Joy to find out more about who this stalker might be. After a few near misses, they finally discover the identity of the stalker but Gorden is in for a rude awakening. Jayden decides to take up a new profession that will boost his image.

programme.desc: Jamie's Festive Feast is a celebration of those lazy winter days at the end of the year. The festive period is the perfect time to kick back, spend some quality time with family and friends, and cook up some amazing dishes. Filmed at his Essex home, Jamie takes a walk through his perfect winter winddown foods, including some stress-free, big-hitting winter warmers, such as Oozy cheesy pasta, and simple one-pot wonders, such as Bloody Mary beef.

programme.title: 21点灵
programme.desc: 振东答应为Kai动手术，德刚和谷欣惊喜不已。手术期间，谷欣和德刚累得打瞌睡，两人中间隔着一段距离。天隆施计，让两人靠在一起。两人醒来，有些尴尬。振东出现，指手术顺利，德刚高兴地拥抱谷欣，谷欣没有拒绝，天隆欣慰。.

programme.title: 21点灵
programme.desc: 谷欣、梓辰和存恩在小型剧场演出梓辰的剧本，存恩扮演两人的女儿，379邀请了他所负责的灵魂来观赏。谷欣和梓辰一起投入演出，把对女儿的感情演绎出来，真情流露，令存恩和舒婷非常感动。谷欣和梓辰很欣慰“一家三口”能够同台演出，激动不已。.

programme.title: 怡凤和妹妹的厨房
programme.desc: 怡凤过去半年到中国照顾女儿，在那里生活了一段时间，如今真的可以卸下艺人身份吗？甚至想过暂别演艺圈？圈中好友王禄江和苏梽诚曾与怡凤在主持界并肩作战，现在也都各自往戏剧发展。后半段的人生里，这两位主持人都往戏剧发展，而作为“前辈”，两位乐于与妹妹分享演戏心得。好友难得相聚，大家不忘互相调侃，互相作弄…….

programme.title: 小屋大作
programme.desc: 由陈汉玮扮演的 Barry Koo 是位积极不怕难的房屋经纪兼室内设计师，热衷介绍和装修小面积的房子，向高难度挑战！首集节目，他将遇到由周崇庆饰演的刁难单身买家，要求要位于成熟市镇、设计要美观又实用的三房式转售组屋。三房式转售组屋的格局和空间诸多限制，能如何创意发挥，就看Barry Koo 有什么好介绍？.

programme.title: 查某人
programme.desc: 在一个坠楼女子的丧礼上，三个家庭主妇相识了―戴秀梅 (庄米雪) 是热心的前女警；云飞雪 (许美珍) 是典型的 Auntie；邱双喜 (洪乙心) 在家兼职卖美容品。三人发现女子的死存有疑点，联手侦查后发现凶手是死者的丈夫。秀梅和飞雪成立侦探社。飞雪对帅哥高翔 (张振寰) 存有幻想，双喜则对高翔印象不佳。秀梅和飞雪洗脱双喜虐待女佣罪名，双喜加入侦探社。.

programme.title: 阿嬷来做饭
programme.desc: 《阿嬷来做饭》是全新实况趣味的烹饪节目。每集节目将邀请一位阿嬷来做菜、示范拿手料理，并传承她的好厨艺。由主持人钟琴搭配不同的男嘉宾主持人，同步跟着阿嬷一起做菜，过程中观察阿嬷烹调的独特方式与习惯、领受她无价的真传，将阿嬷的家传菜肴发扬光大。.

programme.title: 百岁大吉
programme.desc: 世杰准备向素娴求婚，却巧遇素娴的姐妹淘、刚从国外回来的佩文。佩文带着一个男孩Ocean。世杰得知佩文是单亲妈妈，又看到Ocean的习惯和自己相似，不禁想起多年前曾经与佩文醉酒发生一夜情的事，怀疑Ocean是自己的亲骨肉。.

programme.title: 百岁大吉
programme.desc: 世杰被Ocean的事搞得心神不宁。佩文透露她这次是带孩子回来见他父亲的，对方并不知道自己有了孩子。佩文打算让他们父子相认，如果情况允许，他们可能会留下来。世杰听得胆战心惊，直觉地认为佩文是在暗示他要负责任。.

programme.title: 新传媒 LOVE972《新白蛇传》音乐剧
programme.desc: 这个十月，一段千古传说，将燃起全新烈火。 你以为你熟悉《白蛇传》？ 白素贞、小青、许仙、法海——他们当然都在。 但这一次，他们的故事，不止步于西湖断桥。 而是踏入命运交错的深渊，揭开前所未见的真相。 全新人物登场，搅动风云： 一位根植百年的森林姥姥， 一名情深似海却命运曲折的书生宁采臣， 还有一位困于情与命运之间的神秘女鬼…… 当旧神话被重新改写， 爱与恨、忠与叛、天命与选择，如潮涌般交织上演。 一首首熟悉的中文金曲，穿梭于剧情之间被重新点燃； 多媒体视觉与编舞创意齐飞，情节紧凑，动静皆震撼； 972电台全体DJ齐聚舞台， 你熟悉的声音，将化身传奇角色； 更有特别嘉宾倾情加盟，为这段宿命之战添上意想不到的火花； 剧本由周崇庆亲自执笔，情感深刻，笑中带泪。 这不是你以为的《白蛇传》， 而是一场跨越千年的音乐重生。 2025年10月 · 隆重登场 人在江湖，情归何处—— 听一段旧传说，见一次新命运。.
